page.title: 11HODNET CHARITIES COMMITTEE
page.content: The{Hodnet Charities}in the matter of "Charitable Trusts Act 1853-1914" were consolidated into the{Parish of Hodnet Sealed on the 26 May 1916. Money was left in Wills,Gifts, foundations etc. from Jane Hill, Sir Rowland Hill,Jane Pratchett and other unknown donors prior to 1865. {The Charities}are administered by 4 {trustees}elected by the{Parish {Council}+ 1 ex officio trustee,the Rector of St.Luke's Church, Hodnet.
